pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:2.1.7: For further discussion of these, see Plants in the Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:2.1.10: SP.2.988: Ujjavujjaveti yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite ekā āpatti, “Ujjavujjava: however much is pulled by hand, there is one offense when the spindle is turned.”
